item.title: DAL
item.description: score:-37 Chances: Delta Air Lines is planning to resume direct U.S. flights to Israel, indicating a potential increase in revenue from international routes. Risks: The company suspended U.S. service to Israel in response to security concerns, which may indicate ongoing risks related to geopolitical instability impacting their operations.
